column1: 채용공고 상세페이지 [회사 소개] 글로벌 헬스케어 기업인 한국MSD는 1994년 설립된 이후 우수 의약품과 전문 의학정보를 제공 해왔습니다. 건강한 세계를 만들고자 노력하는 기업 비전을 실현하며 한국인의 질병치료와 건강증진을 위해 꾸준히 노력하고 있습니다. 또한 The Fortune지가 선정한 미국에서 "가장 존경받는 기업"으로 11년 연속 수상한 바 있는 세계적인 기업입니다. [채용분야] Data Scientise(정규직) [HR Talk] 한국 MSD에서 MSD Korea의 Key Priority중 하나인 Data Scientist를 모집하며
column2: Ph.D/MSc 학위를 수여하신 분으로 R / Python 활용이 가능하신 분으로 모집하고 있습니다. 포지션에 관심있으신 분들은 인사부 최민정(minjung.choi@merck.com)으로 영문이력서를 첨부하여 지원해주시면 됩니다. *잡코리아 지원은 불가합니다. Summary of job scope: The Senior DataScientist use information and models to gain insight into businessperformance to support fact-based decision. He / She will have opportunities towork on various projects across different business units and functions. Primary Responsibilities: The successful candidate will need to: Communicate effectively across different stakeholders Understand the business context of the decisions to be supported
column3: helping to interpret results and ensure high level adoption Ensure quality on-time delivery according to the standards and best practices methodology Hands-on use of R or Python to design and develop analytical models to mine for insights Promote of a culture of modelling and analytics as a differentiator and competitive advantage ? an environment that places high value on embedding analytical tools within business processes
column4: and using information to make fact-based decisions Qualifications and Skills: Ph.D / MSc Degree in a quantitative field such as Mathematics
column11: Engineering Strong combined background with dual majors are preferred
column12: relevant work experience with demonstrated expertise in using information to analyze business performance
column13: identify opportunities and solve problems Ability to build and interpret probabilistic models of complex
column14: high-dimensional systems is a plus. Experience with Regression Models
column19: formulating and solving OR models like linear (large-scale)
column21: non-linear and evolutionary programming methods. The ability to formulate models
column23: and program and run simulations in some scripting languages like R or Python Collaborative: demonstrated experience applying excellent oral and written communication and interpersonal skills working with global and cross-functional teams towards common goals
column24: realizing that the best results come from the combined efforts of diverse teams. [유의 사항] - PDF 혹은 Word 로 지원 가능합니다. - 서류 합격자에 한해 개별 연락 드립니다. - 문의사항은 minjung.choi@merck.com HR 최민정에게 보내주십시오.
